file_name.description: Name of the file to be processed. The location of the file depends on the context
file_name.title: File name

service_point_id.description: Service point to be used for transactions created from this file (Loans-only).
service_point_id.title: Service point ID

statistical_code.description: Statistical code (code) to be used inventory records created from this file (Instances, Holdings, Items). Specify multiple codes using multi_field_delimiter.
statistical_code.title: Statistical code

create_source_records.description: If set to true, the source records will be created in FOLIO. If set to false, the source records will not be created in FOLIO. Only applied for MARC-based transformations.
create_source_records.title: Create source records

name.description: Name of this migration task. The name is being used to call the specific task, and to distinguish tasks of similar types
name.title: Migration task name

migrationTaskType.description: The type of migration task you want to perform
migrationTaskType.title: Migration task type

description: The tenant ID to use when making requests to FOLIO APIs for this task, if different from library configuration
ecsTenantId.title: ECS tenant ID

groupMapPath.description: Define the path for group mapping
groupMapPath.title: Group map path

departmentsMapPath.description: Define the path for departments mapping. Optional, by dfault is empty string
departmentsMapPath.title: Departments map path

useGroupMap.description: Specify whether to use group mapping. Optional, by default is True
useGroupMap.title: Use group map

userMappingFileName.description: Specify the user mapping file name
userMappingFileName.title: User mapping file name

removeIdAndRequestPreferences.description: Specify whether to remove user ID and request preferences. Optional, by default is False
removeIdAndRequestPreferences.title: Remove ID and request preferences

removeRequestPreferences.description: Specify whether to remove user request preferences. Optional, by default is False
removeRequestPreferences.title: Remove request preferences
